attributes.action: Abolish Silly Rules, Bureaucracy and places like Jobcentres being regarded as Businessess
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We Call for the Abolition of Silly 
Paperwork, Bureaucracy and Rules like
having to have a Plastic Card to go to
Top Floors of Jobcentres in the
United Kingdom.

We Call for the Dismissal of Members of  Staff whom whilst
Living the Life of Riley ILL Treat 
Members of the Public in a Public 
Institution like a Jobcentre.  

We Call for a Social Security System 
not a Social Suffering System
